quotes.title: Irish poet
quotes.quote: Work is the curse of the drinking classes.

quotes.title: America's 16th president
quotes.quote: I am a firm believer in the people. If given the truth, they can be depended upon to meet any national crisis. The great point is to bring them the real facts, and beer.

quotes.title: Musician
quotes.quote: You can't be a real country unless you have a beer and an airline - it helps if you have some kind of football team, or some nuclear weapons, but in the very least you need a beer.

quotes.title: America's 3rd president
quotes.quote: Beer, if drunk in moderation, softens the temper, cheers the spirit and promotes health.

quotes.title: Comedian
quotes.quote: In a study, scientists report that drinking beer can be good for the liver. I’m sorry, did I say ‘scientists’? I meant Irish people.

quotes.title: Author and screenwriter
quotes.quote: Beer’s intellectual. What a shame so many idiots drink it.

quotes.title: Author
quotes.quote: A man who lies about beer makes enemies.

quotes.title: Gonzo journalist
quotes.quote: There is an ancient Celtic axiom that says ‘Good people drink good beer.’ Which is true, then as now. Just look around you in any public barroom and you will quickly see: Bad people drink bad beer. Think about it.

quotes.title: American entrepreneur
quotes.quote: Swaying to new beats, hearing old favorites, and drinking expensive beer are ageless pastimes.

quotes.title: American pop icon
quotes.quote: Homer no function beer well without.

quotes.title: Donut enthusiast
quotes.quote: I would kill everyone in this room for a drop of sweet beer.

quotes.title: Devoted father
quotes.quote: Ah, beer, my one weakness. My Achille’s heel, if you will.

quotes.title: Sector 7G safety inspector
quotes.quote: Oh, Lisa, you and your stories: Bart’s a vampire, beer kills brain cells. Now let’s go back to that… building… thingie… where our beds and TV… is.

quotes.title: Philosopher
quotes.quote: He was a wise man who invented beer.

quotes.title: Prime Minister of England
quotes.quote: Most people hate the taste of beer to begin with. It is, however, a prejudice.

quotes.title: Comedian
quotes.quote: 24 hours in a day, 24 beers in a case. Coincidence?

quotes.title: Comedian
quotes.quote: Give a man a fish and he will eat for a day. Teach him how to fish, and he will sit in a boat and drink beer all day.
